title: Application of Next Generation Semiconductor-Based Sequencing for the Identification of Apis mellifera Complementary Sex Determiner (csd) Alleles from Honey DNA
excerpt: The applied methodology provided a new strategy to disclose the genetic diversity at the csd gene at the population-wide level and identify most, if not all, csd alleles present in the colonies in a single analysis.
citation: Bovo, S.; Ribani, A.; Utzeri, V.J.; Taurisano, V.; Schiavo, G.; Bolner, M.; Fontanesi, L. Application of Next Generation Semiconductor-Based Sequencing for the Identification of Apis mellifera Complementary Sex Determiner (csd) Alleles from Honey DNA. Insects 2021, 12, 868. https://doi.org/10.3390/insects12100868

title: Mining livestock genome datasets for an unconventional characterization of animal DNA viromes
excerpt: In this study, we mined unmapped reads in WGS data for the identification of virus sequences in several livestock species
citation: Bovo, S., Schiavo, G., Bolner, M., Ballan, M., & Fontanesi, L. (2022). Mining livestock genome datasets for an unconventional characterization of animal DNA viromes. Genomics., 114(2). https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ygeno.2022.110312

title: Investigation of ABO Gene Variants across More Than 60 Pig Breeds and Populations and Other Suidae Species Using Whole-Genome Sequencing Datasets
excerpt: In this study, we explored the main alleles present in the ABO blood group gene (A and O) in different pig breeds and other Suinae species, and other variants besides these two major forms to investigate the evolution of ABO and its possible association with several production and blood-related traits.
citation: Bolner, M.; Bertolini, F.; Bovo, S.; Schiavo, G.; Fontanesi, L. Investigation of ABO Gene Variants across More Than 60 Pig Breeds and Populations and Other Suidae Species Using Whole-Genome Sequencing Datasets. Animals 2024, 14, 5. https://doi.org/10.3390/ani14010005
